de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.particity.portlet

Class BaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.particity.portlet.BaseController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminController, HeaderController, InitController, LatestController, LoginController, MainController, MainController, ManagementController, ProfileController, RedirectController, RegistrationController, RegistrationController, SearchController

    public class BaseController
extends Object
    An abstract controller class to bundle common utility methods used by all controllers
